localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Hue Sentiment is an easy to use Philips Hue light app which translates text into a mood. Simply type how you're feeling and notice the lights change based on your mood.
blogPost.body: Hue Sentiment is an easy to use Philips Hue light app which translates text into a mood. Simply type how you're feeling and notice the lights change based on your mood.
blogPost.title: Hue Sentiment - Control lights with your mood
blogPost.author: rihab

localize.description: Hue Sentiment是一款简单易用的飞利浦Hue灯应用程序，它可以将文字转化为一种心情。只需键入您的心情，就会发现灯光会根据您的心情而变化。
Hue Sentiment是一款簡單易用的飛利浦Hue燈應用程序，它可以將文字轉化爲一種心情。只需鍵入您的心情，就會發現燈光會根據您的心情而變化。

previous.excerpt: Terapify is a video chat platform that connects people who need psychological help with vetted psychotherapists who share their culture and language in an easy, secure and affordable way.
previous.title: Terapify - Online therapy platform for Spanish-speaking people

localize.description: Terapify是一个视频聊天平台，它将需要心理帮助的人与经过审核的心理治疗师联系起来，这些心理治疗师与他们有着相同的文化和语言，是一种简单、安全和实惠的方式。
localize.tagline: 西班牙人的在线治疗平台

localize.description: Terapify是一個視頻聊天平臺，它將需要心理幫助的人與經過審覈的心理治療師聯繫起來，這些心理治療師與他們有着相同的文化和語言，是一種簡單、安全和實惠的方式。
localize.tagline: 西班牙人的在線治療平臺

next.title:
A year ago the $VIX closed at a record high: 82.69.

Today it moved down to 19.23, its lowest level since the pandemic began and back below its historical average (19.50).

Charting via @ycharts https://t.co/NwUFslKC3K

localize.full_text:
一年前，VIX美元收盘价创下历史新高：82.69。

今天，它下行至19.23，这是疫情开始以来的最低水平，并回到历史平均水平（19.50）以下。

制图来自@ycharts https://t.co/NwUFslKC3K

一年前，VIX美元收盤價創下歷史新高：82.69。

今天，它下行至19.23，這是疫情開始以來的最低水平，並回到歷史平均水平（19.50）以下。

製圖來自@ycharts https://t.co/NwUFslKC3K
